AssumeRole.title: AssumeRole
AssumeRole.summary: Obtains a Security Token Service (STS) token to assume a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

AssumeRoleWithOIDC.title: AssumeRoleWithOIDC
AssumeRoleWithOIDC.summary: Queries a Security Token Service (STS) token to assume a Resource Access Management (RAM) role during role-based single sign-on (SSO) by using OpenID Connect (OIDC).

AssumeRoleWithSAML.title: AssumeRoleWithSAML
AssumeRoleWithSAML.summary: Obtains a Security Token Service (STS) token to assume a Resource Access Management (RAM) role during role-based single sign-on (SSO) by using Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML).

GetCallerIdentity.title: GetCallerIdentity
GetCallerIdentity.summary: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the current requester belongs.
